name: JUNGSmartVisuServer
0:
”Alexa, set my bathroom to 22 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lighting”
”Alexa, turn on ceiling light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the help of Alexa skills, you can control all the devices in your home that are networked with the Smart Visu Server using voice commands (in addition to operation via smartphone or tablet).

Prerequisites for the use of the skills are the local installation of the Smart Visu Server and free registration on MyJUNG (www.jung.de/en/2402/service/myjung). 

After the registration you link the Smart Visu Server with your MyJUNG account and select the required functions. Finally, you connect to your installation via the Alexa skill

Using the skill, you can define specific scenes or functions for your home: 
“Alexa, set my bathroom to 22 degrees” 
“Alexa, turn on the kitchen lighting” 
“Alexa, turn on ceiling light” 

Please contact the electrical installer of your choice to receive further information about the Smart Visu Server.
